modName: Female Orc Hair For Human and Elves -WIP-
summary: This is v2 of the Female Orc Hair for another Race mod, now for Humans and Elves
descriptionHtml:
This is v2 of my little Modification that replaces some of the \"Ugly\" Human and now Elv hairstyles with \"Prettyer\" ones from Female Orcs. 

Its still work in Progress and will be Updated as soon as Creation kit is been released.

Known Issues:
the crossing between hair and skin is visible. Due to the lack of hairstyles the model would have to be adjusted

v2: Hair has been added to every elven race in the Game,
also i took other human hairstyles for replacing as some people seem to like the hair i       replaced in v1.


Install:
Just add \"Meshes\" to \"Data\" folder.



Enjoy!
author: Wogu

files.name: Female Orc Hair for Human and Elves v2
